summary: A morally ambiguous corporation experiments with genetic modification resulting in the creation of a man hunting creature. When it escapes, a group of unsuspecting cabin dwellers become its prey in a horrifying game of cat and mouse.
cast: James Remar|Sherilyn Fenn|Ron Carlson|Graham Greene|Allegra Carpenter|Ray Wise|Ivana Korab|Q'orianka Kilcher|Stephanie Hodes|Gregory Cruz|Mark Hodos|Luke Martino|Ron Martino
title: Unnatural
